refnamediv.refpurpose: Listing of non-error enums and associated utility functions

listitem.para: Convert an waffle_enum token to a string. For example, convert WAFFLE_DONT_CARE to "WAFFLE_DONT_CARE". Return null if the token is not a valid waffle_enum.
This function always sets the error code to WAFFLE_NO_ERROR. It can be called before waffle has been successfully initialized with waffle_init3
